entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Ice pellets. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Ice pellets ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023
